content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to a power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) which is currently not researching anything.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of an assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) which is currently not receiving electricity and cannot create automation-science-pack due to missing resources.

### Pipe groups
Consists of multiple pipe groups:
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=42803, position -18.5, 16.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=42806, position -12.5, 21.5, fluid=water)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=42809, position -9.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=42814, position -10.5, 22.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=42815, position -6.5, 23.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions you are trying to connect with pipes are valid and reachable. Check for any obstacles or incorrect positioning that may prevent the connection.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities. In this case, ensure you have coal available to insert into the boiler.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
